    L

    listCards() - Method in class hu.petrik.bankdesktopapp.MainPage
    Lists all bank accounts for the active user and updates the card list in the UI.
    listTransactions() - Method in class hu.petrik.bankdesktopapp.MainPage
    Filters and displays the transactions based on the active filter (e.g., income, expense).
    ListUsers() - Method in class hu.petrik.bankdesktopapp.CardDetail
    Retrieves and displays the list of users associated with the active bank account.
    loadCharts(int) - Method in class hu.petrik.bankdesktopapp.MainPage
    Loads foreign currency exchange rate charts for the specified number of days.
    loadCryptoCharts(int) - Method in class hu.petrik.bankdesktopapp.MainPage
    Loads cryptocurrency charts with data for the specified number of days.
    loadRepeatableList() - Method in class hu.petrik.bankdesktopapp.RepeatableListController
    Loads the list of repeatable transactions associated with the active bank account and updates the corresponding ListView component to display them.
    loadSecondFxml(ActionEvent) - Method in class hu.petrik.bankdesktopapp.MainController
    Handles the login process and loads the MainPage.fxml if the login is successful.
    login(String, String) - Method in class hu.petrik.bankdesktopapp.RestApi
    Authenticates a user by sending their email and password to the login endpoint.
    logOut(ActionEvent) - Method in class hu.petrik.bankdesktopapp.MainPage
    Logs the user out of the application and returns to the login screen.
